sections.heading: proceedings; attorney's fees; costs
sections.text: Nothing in sections 42-347 to 42-381 shall prohibit a party from initiating contempt proceedings. Costs, including a reasonable attorney's fee, may be taxed against a party found to be in contempt.SourceLaws 1972, LB 820, ยง 24;Laws 1997, LB 229, ยง 18.AnnotationsIn
